opinion_type_analysis.basis_for_opinion_extract: We conducted our audit in accordance with International Standards on Auditing (ISAs). Our responsibilities under those standards are further described in the Auditors' Responsibilities section.

key_audit_matters_extraction.description: Revenue Recognition - Total reported revenue Tk. 187,729,653, revenue recognized through execution of contracts with Government & Non-Government Institutions
key_audit_matters_extraction.auditor_response: Tested design and operating effectiveness of controls, traced performance obligations, tested occurrence and accuracy of sales revenue
key_audit_matters_extraction.frca_risk_assessment: High - revenue is predominant in determining financial performance

key_audit_matters_extraction.description: Valuation of Inventory and Project in Progress - Inventory Tk. 348,618,026 & Project in Progress Tk. 164,892,183
key_audit_matters_extraction.auditor_response: Verified appropriateness of management's assumptions, evaluated inventory controls, checked reconciliation and movement
key_audit_matters_extraction.frca_risk_assessment: High - involves management judgements and estimation uncertainty

key_audit_matters_extraction.description: Valuation of Property, Plant and Equipment - Carrying value Tk. 1,003,519,247
key_audit_matters_extraction.auditor_response: Assessed accounting policies, checked capitalization, verified documents, physically inspected sample PPEs
key_audit_matters_extraction.frca_risk_assessment: High - significant balance to financial statements

key_audit_matters_extraction.description: Recoverability Assessment of Trade Receivables - Total Tk. 219,737,791
key_audit_matters_extraction.auditor_response: Tested accuracy of ageing on sample basis
key_audit_matters_extraction.frca_risk_assessment: Medium - significant number of individual small customers

emphasis_of_matter_paragraphs: EPS significantly fell due to decrease in revenue and market conditions
IPO Fund not utilized within stipulated time - extension applied up to December 2024
Dredger capitalized under PPE with delayed installation
IPO subscription money Tk. 197,630 untraceable but reflected in cash
Some purchase and payments made other than banking channel
